metadata.title: CVE-2019-3833 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Openwsman, versions up to and including 2.6.9, are vulnerable to infinite loop in process_connection() when parsing specially crafted HTTP requests. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by sending malicious HTTP request to cause denial of service to openwsman server.

criterions.comment: openwsman package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
